00021 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 //  A define in the build for each project is also used to control whether
00023 //  the export keyword is from the project's viewpoint or the client's.
00024 //  These defines provide the platform specific keywords that they need
00025 //  to do this.
00026 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT
00028 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT
00029 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT_FUNCTION(T) T XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT
00030 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT_FUNCTION(T) T XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT
00031 
00032 
00033 #if __SUNPRO_CC >= 0x520
00034 
00035 #define XALAN_HAS_CPP_NAMESPACE
00036 #define XALAN_STRICT_ANSI_HEADERS
00037 
00038 #else
00039 
00040 // Sun Workshop 4.2 _does_ support new cast syntax, but it's
00041 // broken with extra cv-qualifiers, so we'll use old-style casts.
00042 #define XALAN_OLD_STYLE_CASTS
00043 
00044 #define XALAN_NO_STD_NAMESPACE
00045 #define XALAN_STLPORT_STL
00046 #define XALAN_NO_DEFAULT_BUILTIN_ARRAY_INITIALIZATION
00047 #define XALAN_CLASSIC_IOSTREAMS
00048 #define XALAN_NO_MUTABLE
00049 #define XALAN_SGI_BASED_STL
00050 #define XALAN_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00051 #define XALAN_BOOL_AS_INT
00052 #define XALAN_NO_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENTS
00053 #define XALAN_NO_COVARIANT_RETURN_TYPE
00054 #define XALAN_NO_USING_DECLARATION

00056 // STL Port Definitions
